Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Vancomycin (0.5-32 µg/mL) GP-Detection of VRSA
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture of aerobic Gram-negative bacteria
Pure culture of facultative anaerobic Gram-negative bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for vancomycin antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, including detection of vancomycin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (VRSA).
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid identification and in vitro antimicrobial susceptibility testing of isolates from pure culture of most aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria of human origin, specifically including quantitative determination of vancomycin susceptibility and detection of vancomycin resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
